entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RID-based restore should not be necessary for PSCD apps #34198

Closed

  • How to avoid double writes for ijwhost.dll in NuGet packages? #34213
  • NETSDK1139 should suggest enabling the workload resolver when disabled #33395
    7.0.4xx
  • dotnet sdk check should also update #34131
  • dotnet run error error CS1001: Identifier expected #27687

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove unused usings #34225
    untriaged
  • [main] Disable ConfigurationBinder source generator in Blazor WASM #34220
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 20.4.0 to 20.6.0 in /eng/dependabot #34200
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: 7.0.4xx
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 20.4.0 to 20.6.0 in /eng/dependabot #34199
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main

Merged

  • Port 33753 to main #34212
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix single-file static web assets tests #34186
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • Fix package verification for some valid packages on windows #34143
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix package verification for some valid packages on windows #34144
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure
  • Revert "#30336 Default Dotnet Tool to Run on Latest Runtime - Build time change" #34132
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Add separate warnings for settings that depend on illink pack #34077
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Configurable wwwroot for StaticWebAssets #34178
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Containers: Protocol correctness and quirk handling for Basic and Bearer authentication for registries #33753
    untriaged, Area-Containers
